Class UnmanagedArray<T>

An Array stored in unmanaged memory. May help relieve pressure from the Garbage Collector

Inheritance

Implements

Namespace: piine.Memory
Assembly: piine.dll
Syntax
public class UnmanagedArray<T> : IList<T>, ICollection<T>, IEnumerable<T>, IEnumerable, IDisposable where T : struct
Type Parameters
Name Description
T

The unmanaged type that the array will contain
